Posts.Content: AmyDee wrote: Woke up Thurs. 7/26/12 with a pink rash on my right breast (was inflammed and hot to the touch).  Friday 7/27/12 Went to my PCP who didn't think it looked "right", not a "typical dermititis".  He prescribed antibios and said if it was not looking better by Monday (today) to come back for him to check it and if necessary send me for a mamo & ultrasound.  Rash appeared to be worse to me, red in color, skin wrinkly, with a leather-like feel.  Today he said he thinks it looks better...not as big of an area and not as hot to the touch.  I requested to still have the mammo and ultrasound; the first appointment available is Wednesday.  So, here's my question to all of you with experience... could this be IBC?  Has anyone's IBC looked like this? Here is some background info about me: 34 years old Missed menstral period for 4 months - Tubaligation done in 2003 after second child. Approximately 7 years ago found lump on right breast, had biopsy and result was benign.  Was told it was more than likely from the underwire bras I wear. Breast/nipple is always itchy for the past 6 months or so Sudden rash -see pics (link below)  www.flickr.com/photos/83890124... (This first pic is from day 2 of the rash)    This pic is day 4 This is from tonight...(the "hole" near the center is from me picking at it...I know I shouldn't have, but I am the curious type) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Opnions PLEEEASE! AmyDee autism_mom

Posts.Content: Jul 31, 2012 10:38PM AmyDee wrote: Thanks so much for responding.  Even if it turns out not to be IBC, I know that something is NOT right with this.  I intend to follow up with a breast specialist no matter what the mammo/ultrasound results are.  I will let you know what I find out...when I find out.  Thanks again!!
Posts.Title: Opnions PLEEEASE! AmyDee autism_mom

Posts.Content: Aug 8, 2012 02:53PM AmyDee wrote: Sorry for not replying sooner.  I've been trying to decide what path to take.  The "Center for Breast Health" mammo technician was concerned with the rash and had their nurse do a physical breast exam.  She did not find any abnormalities.  Had the mammo done and the results are read by the radiologist immediately.  Didn't meet him/her but they said the mammo was normal and it is not necessary to perform the us.  The rash seems mostly cleared and my Dr. didn't seem to be concerned.  However, I still have shooting pains throughout the breast and still itching.  As well as a new symptom feeling as if my nipple is "tingling/burning" on the inside.   I am a busy mom of two who works full-time and I know I need to put my health first, but I don't want to make "a mountain out of a molehill".  Also, I am not a very good self-advocate, I'm a "laid-back" kinda girl and don't really know how to assert myself or if I even need to assert myself.  I have done TONS of research on IBC and I guess I just don't know what to do?  Do you have to have all or most of the symptoms to have IBC...'cause I don't...just some???
Posts.Title: Opnions PLEEEASE! AmyDee autism_mom

Posts.Content: AmyDee wrote: I have not been diagnosed.  I hear everyone's symptoms can be different. Would any of you be willing to share with me what your initial or total symtems of IBC? Log in to post a reply
